I believe it would greatly enhance your experience and productivity. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $95 for this exceptional item. I'm confident this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
